short_description: veggie is a fruit & vegetable market based in zagreb, croatia.
long_description: kroz želju, rad i trud sve je moguće. naš mali tim entuzijasta kojeg na čelu čine ekonomist i agronom stvorio je od starog imanja (kojeg su mnogi otpisali – bez potencijala) u proizvodno-skladišnu jedinicu, plasteničku proizvodnju i naš mali raj – prostor za odmor i druženje. kada sve stavimo na hrpu dobije se srčano mjesto na kojem nastaju naši slasni delikatesni proizvodi kombinacijom tradicionalnih recepta naših baka i moderne kuhinje. za tjednu dozu provjereno domaćeg i zdravog, nazovite nas ili nas kontaktirajte. naši delikatesni proizvodi napravljene su po principu spajanja tradicionalne i moderne recepture.
generated_description: veggie, legally known as veggie d.o.o., is a company based in razljev, zagreb county, croatia. established in 2015, veggie specializes in producing fresh, homemade delicacies and vegetable preparations. the company originates from an old estate and operates a production facility, plastic production, and a space for relaxation and socializing. veggie combines traditional recipes with modern culinary techniques to create unique products such as green pepper pekmez, cherry bomb chili peppers stuffed with cheese, pesto from dried peppers, and gluten-free homemade hay. veggie's offerings are available in various locations throughout croatia.
